message: Per your request, attached is a Name Change Form. In order to change your name on our mail list please complete the form, make changes in the Box provided and include a copy of an official identification showing your new name and address (driver's license, sporting license, or state ID). Your name, address, and date of birth on the verification form MUST match your official identification.

form_details.name: Donna Prater
form_details.certification: I certify that I am a smoker; that I am 21 years of age or older; and that I want to receive offers, premiums, coupons, or free cigarettes that may be sent to me in the mail. I understand that giving false information in order to accept these offers may constitute violation of law.

form_notes: Offer Restricted to Smokers 21 Years of Age or Older. No Copies or Facsimiles of This Form Will be Accepted.
